TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EnvelopeVersion extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains information related to the version of SOAP associated with a message and its exchange.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 目前可用的 SOAP 版本為 SOAP 1.1 和 SOAP 1.2。 每個版本的 SOAP 都有一個 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion>，可以使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.Soap11%2A> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.Soap12%2A> 屬性來復原。 此外，還有 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.None%2A> 訊息版本，可以用來傳送與接收不使用 SOAP 格式的 XML 訊息。 與每個訊息版本相關的處理角色，可以使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.NextDestinationActorValue%2A> 屬性和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.GetUltimateDestinationActorValues%2A> 方法來復原。
## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何存取 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion> 的方法和屬性。
[!code-csharp[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/vb/module1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string[] GetUltimateDestinationActorValues() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a string that contains the URI name for the SOAP role associated with the current message version for the ultimate destination.
Docs.returns: An empty string if SOAP1.1 is used; a string that contains http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/role/ultimateReceiver if SOAP1.2 is used.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果指定 `null`，則最終接收者為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.None%2A>。
## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/cs/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[S_UEEnvelopeVersion#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueenvelopeversion/vb/module1.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NextDestinationActorValue As String
public: property System::String ^ NextDestinationActorValue { System::String ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a string that contains the URI name for the SOAP role associated with the current message version for the next destination.
Docs.value: 字串，包含http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/actor/next如果使用 SOAP1.1; 字串，其中包含http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope/role/next如果使用 SOAP1.2，則; 以及如果訊息版本 none，則為空字串。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property None As EnvelopeVersion
public: static property System::ServiceModel::EnvelopeVersion ^ None { System::ServiceModel::EnvelopeVersion ^ get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the envelope version not using a version of SOAP.
Docs.value: 不使用 SOAP 格式的封套版本。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.EnvelopeVersion.None%2A> 訊息版本，則表示 SOAP 封套並未寫出，而且訊息會發出本文內容。 這可讓 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 通道，與所預期 XML 的格式沒有 SOAP 端點進行通訊。 XML 承載存在於訊息本文中，當它遇到編碼器時，也是唯一發送出的東西。
同樣地，當收到任意 XML 區塊時，它會包裝在訊息中，以傳播通道堆疊。 接著，會插入所需的標頭，並處理該訊息，就如同它是 SOAP 訊息一樣。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Soap11 As EnvelopeVersion
public: static property System::ServiceModel::EnvelopeVersion ^ Soap11 { System::ServiceModel::EnvelopeVersion ^ get(); };

remarks.format:

Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

Docs.summary: Gets a string that represents the current envelope version.
Docs.returns: The string representation of the current envelope version.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法傳回人們可讀取的且與文化特性有關的字串。
